review:
I feel this is a FAB movie..diff from its time...multi starrer...top stars..brilliant songs...location...musst watch film..vry Xperimental BOLD role...yes it didnt do well....but this is a unique effort....super talent cast..
Goood job....fk da world wat de say..

This was released much ahead of its time in India, that too in hindi dub. I think it should be re-released now in its original English-hindi version....it will be a cult hit for sure in it genre's. Brilliantly made dark comedy movie with fantastic actors.
